OUR SERVICES

Preventative patrol services are proactive security measures to deter theft, vandalism, and other crime.

24/7 Patrol provides the most professionals security patrol officers available for you, 365 days of the year. Our patrol guards are highly trained and experienced to ensure outstanding results in the protection of your property and assets. We count on a professional management team that will keep you updated with all that happens in your property. 24/7 Patrol offers you customized services, tailored to your needs.

Dont lose any time! Your safety is guaranteed with us.

Need help? Call our 24/7 incident response line (877) 482-7343
